text: niccayamaka allah tan itanai haramakkinan ena catci collakkutiya unkal catcikalaik kontu varunkal" enru kurum; avarkal catci kurinal, (avarkal poyyarakaveyiruppar) avarkalutan cerntu nir catci colla ventam - nam vacanankalaip poyppikkinravarkal, marumaiyai nampatavarkal akiyorin vinana mana iccaikalai nir pinparra ventam - enenil avarkal tam tankal iraivanukkup pala teyvankalai inaiyakkukinranar
